original_text: He disarmed the rulers and authorities and put them to open shame, by triumphing over them in him.
korean_text: 통치자들과 권세들을 무력화하여 드러내어 구경거리로 삼으시고 십자가로 그들을 이기셨느니라

sentences.original_text: He disarmed the rulers and authorities
and put them to open shame
by triumphing over them in him.
